channel.title: tornado on Daniel Mejía Raigosa
channel.description: Recent content in tornado on Daniel Mejía Raigosa

item.title: Python Web Frameworks: An Overview of Django vs Flask vs Tornado vs Pyramid
item.description: Reading guide The text is accompanied with questions and observations at the end, such that notes of the form (Q#) correspond to the question number # on the list. In the same fashion (O#) indicates the observation number #. Notes on Flask http://flask.pocoo.org/ https://github.com/pallets/flask “Flask is a (Q1)microframework for Python based on Werkzeug(Q2), Jinja 2(Q3) and good intentions.” BSD Licensed. Latest release 0.12.2 (github tag). Flask is minimalistic, so it doesn’t decide for you what to use, it lets you to use extensions provided the task you need.
